titleStmt.title: A short relation of the river Nile of its sourse and current, of its overflowing the Campagnia of Ægypt, till it runs into the Mediterranean, and of other curiosities / written by an eye-witnesse, who lived many years in the chief kingdoms of the Abyssine empire.
Itinerário. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Lobo, Jerónimo, 1596?-1678.
Wyche, Peter, Sir, 1628-1699?

notesStmt.note: Translation by Sir Peter Wyche of: Itinerario / J. Lobo.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
